column4: grrrr, im having trouble with mounting dvds, and playing them for that matter
I cant eject my dvd now
it tells me its not mounted, but it has to be if I cannot eject it
conman: how many cd drives do you have
4 DVD Burners (dont ask why, I just do)
youre talking about wake on lan
yeah ive tried all the drivers, it tells me it is not mounted
pull out the disk when it turns off
but I dont want to do that every time
i know that will get the disc out
we are getting to windows level of complexity with our HALs and such
